validateSignatureProfile

public static boolean validateSignatureProfile(org.opensaml.xml.signature.Signature s)
Validate if signature conform to SAML Signature profile. Useful to prevent certain types of denial-of-service attacks associated with signature verification. This method DO NOT cryptographically verify the signature, just check if is a valid signature for SAML.

Returns:
true if the signature
